import React, { Fragment } from "react"; import { Button, Modal } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; //** Import SVG Image */ import { Icon01, Icon02, Icon03, Icon04, Icon05, Icon06, Icon07, Icon08, Icon09, } from "./SearchJobsIcon"; //** Import Single Job Components */ import SingleJob from "./SingleJob"; import { Dropdown } from "react-bootstrap"; const SearchJobs = () => { const JobData = [ { subTitle: "In progress", jobTitle: "Database Programmer", icon: Icon08, lowRate: "14,000", highRate: "25,000", description: "", locationCountry: "Remote", }, { subTitle: "Done", jobTitle: "Backend Developer", icon: Icon04, lowRate: "14,000", highRate: "25,000", description: "", locationCountry: "London", }, { subTitle: "Error ⚠️", jobTitle: "Frontend Developer", icon: Icon03, lowRate: "14,000", highRate: "25,000", description: "", locationCountry: "Barcelona", }, ]; const [jobList, setJobList] = useState(JobData); const [applyForJobs, setApplyForJobs] = useState(false); const [job, setJob] = useState({ subTitle: "In progress", jobTitle: "", icon: Icon08, salary: "", country: "", }); function handleSubmit(event) { event.preventDefault(); // Create new job object let newJobThread = { subTitle: "In Progress", jobTitle: job.jobTitle, icon: Icon03, lowRate: "14,000", highRate: "25,000", description: "", locationCountry: "Barcelona", }; setJobList([...jobList, job]); // submit the form data to the server axios .post("http://127.0.0.1:8000/post", { email: "thainabbraz@gmail.com", password: "123456", }) .then((response) => { console.log(response); }) .catch((error) => { console.log(error); }); } const handleInputChange = (event) => { const { name, value } = event.target; setJob((prevState) => ({ ...prevState, [name]: value })); }; return ( {/*
Location
London Barcelona
FILTER FIND
*/} {/*
Suggestions Your Skill Programmer Software Engineer Photographer Digital Marketing
*/}
{/* Showing 3 Jobs Results */}
{/* Based your preferences */}
{/*
*/} {/* Apply for jobs Details Cancel */}
Apply For Jobs
{ setApplyForJobs(false); handleSubmit(e); }} >
{/* Map Single Job Components */} {jobList.map((jobData, i) => ( ))}
); }; export default SearchJobs;
